title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: Silky egg sauce, pecorino, and crisp guanciale tossed through hot pasta.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Charred chicken in a rich, creamy tomato gravy spiced just right.

title: Avocado Toast
